snippet.title: Pigeon Simulator - Gameplay Trailer | Xbox @ Gamescom 2023
snippet.description: Check out the gameplay trailer for Pigeon Simulator, the physics sandbox roguelite where you fly around as a pigeon. Pigeon Simulator will be available in Early Access in 2024, and it's coming to PC, Xbox, and PlayStation.
